snippet: A title or a medal at the World Figure Skating Championships is often a springboard to Olympic success.
lead_paragraph: A title or a medal at the World Figure Skating Championships is often a springboard to Olympic success.

headline.seo: Figure Skaters Use World Championships as Spark Toward Olympics
headline.main: Skaters Use World Stage to Gain Confidence on Their Path to the Olympics
headline.print_headline: Skaters Use World Stage to Gain Confidence on Their Path to the Olympics
